'''''Fire Rat's Robe, Dragon-Head Pearl, Sacred Offering Bowl, and...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[The Light of Day]]''. This achievement is earned during part 3 of the quest ''[[The Subterranean Trials of Drake and Serpent]]''.

==Trivia==
* This is a reference to ''{{w|The Tale of the Bamboo Cutter}}'', in which Princess Kaguya devises five impossible tasks for five noble suitors she does not wish to marry. Three of her requested items are mentioned in this achievement's name. The [[Bloodbranch Coral]] corresponds to the jeweled branch from the mythical island of {{w|w:Hōrai|Hōrai}} that one of her suitors is required to obtain.
